entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then a few showers. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High 18. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
